description: This trap is generated when
SLAP connection to the SS7 Gateway goes down.

event.Summary: SS7 gateway $v2 is down due to $v4

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD USR-SS7-MIB::usrSS7SLAPGatewayDownTrap USR-SS7-MIB::usrSS7SLAPChassisID i 9999 USR-SS7-MIB::usrSS7SLAPgatewayIPAddress a 192.0.2.1 USR-SS7-MIB::usrSS7SLAPgatewayPort i 9999 USR-SS7-MIB::usrSS7SLAPPrimaryLinkDownCause i 0

description: uniquely identify the TCH in a WAN.
variables.name: USR-SS7-MIB::usrSS7SLAPChassisID

description: The IP address of the SLAP SS7 gateway.
variables.name: USR-SS7-MIB::usrSS7SLAPgatewayIPAddress

description: The TCP port# of the SLAP SS7 gateway.
variables.name: USR-SS7-MIB::usrSS7SLAPgatewayPort

description: The status of the SLAP Connection to the Secondary SS7 gateway.
variables.name: USR-SS7-MIB::usrSS7SLAPPrimaryLinkDownCause

description: This trap is generated when
SLAP connection to the SS7 Gateway is restored.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD USR-SS7-MIB::usrSS7SLAPGatewayUPTrap USR-SS7-MIB::usrSS7SLAPChassisID i 9999 USR-SS7-MIB::usrSS7SLAPgatewayIPAddress a 192.0.2.1 USR-SS7-MIB::usrSS7SLAPgatewayPort i 9999

description: uniquely identify the TCH in a WAN.
variables.name: USR-SS7-MIB::usrSS7SLAPChassisID

description: The IP address of the SLAP SS7 gateway.
variables.name: USR-SS7-MIB::usrSS7SLAPgatewayIPAddress

description: The TCP port# of the SLAP SS7 gateway.
variables.name: USR-SS7-MIB::usrSS7SLAPgatewayPort

description: This trap is generated when
ENFAS connection to the HiperDSP slot is Down.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD USR-SS7-MIB::usrSS7ENFASConnectionDownTrap USR-SS7-MIB::usrSS7SLAPChassisID i 9999 USR-SS7-MIB::usrSS7Slot i 9999 USR-SS7-MIB::usrSS7ENFASLinkDownCause i 0

description: uniquely identify the TCH in a WAN.
variables.name: USR-SS7-MIB::usrSS7SLAPChassisID

description: The slot number of this row.
variables.name: USR-SS7-MIB::usrSS7Slot

description: The status of the SLAP Connection to the Secondary SS7 gateway.
variables.name: USR-SS7-MIB::usrSS7ENFASLinkDownCause

description: This trap is generated when
ENFAS connection to the HiperDSP slot is restored.
uniquely identify the TCH in a WAN.
variables.name: USR-SS7-MIB::usrSS7SLAPChassisID

description: The slot number of this row.
variables.name: USR-SS7-MIB::usrSS7Slot
